title: Crysis Warhead®
notes: Error message on launch "There seems to be a problem contacting license server".

title: Crysis Warhead®
notes: To make this game work flawlessly, set Steam launch option "PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%". Then delete the /Crysis Warhead/Bin32/ folder. Delete the file /Crysis Warhead/Bin64/Crysis.exe. Rename the file  /Crysis Warhead/Bin64/Crysis64.exe to Crysis.exe. And finally rename the folder Bin64 to Bin32. (Note this workaround is also needed on native Windows newer than 7).

Renamed the folders Bin32 to "Bin32 Copy" and Bin64 to Bin32  in <steam install location>/steamapps/common/Crysis Warhead in the 'new' Bin32 then renamed Crysis.exe to Crysis.exe ORIG and renamed Crysis64.exe to Crysis.exe. 

Set games launch options in steam to
PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%

On first start accepted all install steps (including all failures and continued). Played game to second checkpoint at GAMER settings seemed fine.
title: Crysis Warhead®

notes:
Second chapter (Shore leave) is stuck at 99% and won't load. I investigated and this seems to be issue with Warhead in general. Workaround provided (changing resolution) did not work for me.
In multiple monitor setup mouse cursor doesn't work on default resolution(1024x840) - you move it on different monitor and it reacts on a different one, where the game actually is ( You have to change it to 1920x1280 then it works fine
title: Crysis Warhead®

cpu: CPU 品牌：Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700 CPU @ 3.60GHz
